name: RoboNumbers
0:
”Alexa, open Robo Numbers”
”Alexa, ask Robo Numbers to guess my number”
”Alexa, ask Robo Numbers to pick the number”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: robo numbers
des:
You can start the "Pick the number" game mode if you would like to pick a number and let the device guess it. Select "Guess the number" mode where you will have to guess the chosen number. Default valid number range is 1-20. At the end of the game, Alexa will give you an interesting fact about the number you just had in the game.

Say "Change limit to 100" or "Set limit to 50" to change valid numbers range. 
Say "Repeat number info" to get last number info again.
At any time you can ask for "Help", "Navigate home", "Give up" or "Stop" the game.

Although the game itself is a simple one, we tried to provide a smart and rich conversation interface to enhance the user experience. 

We hope you'll enjoy playing it!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
